The others, stay right beside me!^ Taurina dan Gil, kalian hampiri orang itu, yang lainnya tetap di sampingku!\",\"index\":0,\"originalChoicePath\":\"0.g-0.38\",\"originalThreadIndex\":7,\"targetPath\":\"0.g-0.c-6\"},{\"text\":\"Here take this cloth to bandage her wound.^ Ambil ini. Gunakan kain ini untuk membalut lukanya.\",\"index\":0,\"originalChoicePath\":\"0.g-0.44\",\"originalThreadIndex\":8,\"targetPath\":\"0.g-0.c-7\"}]}},\"currentFlowName\":\"DEFAULT_FLOW\",\"variablesState\":{\"playerName\":\"^Testing\"},\"evalStack\":[],\"visitCounts\":{\"\":1,\"0.c-0\":1,\"0.g-0\":1},\"turnIndices\":{},\"turnIdx\":0,\"storySeed\":41,\"previousRandom\":0,\"inkSaveVersion\":10,\"inkFormatVersion\":21}","traitMetaData":[{"trait":"Relationship Driven","score":0,"iconKey":"icon_adelphi","subtrait":[{"traitId":"diplomatic","score":0},{"traitId":"empathy","score":0},{"traitId":"cooperative","score":0},{"traitId":"trust","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You are someone who focuses on interpersonal relationships and dynamics. When dealing with others, you are peaceful and harmonious, and when there is a difference of opinion, you prefer to avoid conflict. Furthermore, it is natural for you to relate to others’ feelings and to put yourself in others’ shoes. You do your best to maintain a relationship with others, whether this means sharing credit with others during a teamwork setting, or simply believing in the goodness of others and giving people the benefit of the doubt before coming up with preconceived judgements.","descriptionID":"Anda adalah seseorang yang berfokus kepada hubungan interpersonal dan dinamika. Ketika berhadapan dengan orang lain, Anda mencoba untuk berdamai dan harmonis, dan Anda lebih suka menghindari konflik ketika ada perbedaan pendapat. Selain itu, wajar bagi Anda untuk mengerti perasaan orang lain dan menempatkan diri Anda pada posisi orang lain. Anda mencoba untuk menjaga hubungan dengan orang lain entah itu berbagi penghargaan dengan orang lain dalam kerjasama tim, menaruh kepercayaan atas kebaikan orang lain, atau berprasangka baik sebelum menilai orang lain."},{"trait":"Results Driven","iconKey":"icon_azachem","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"ambitious","score":0},{"traitId":"competitive","score":100},{"traitId":"direct","score":0},{"traitId":"rational","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You are someone who prioritizes targets and results. When approaching different things, it is natural for you to take a goal-oriented approach, while looking for different ways to “win” and constantly be the best at what you do while ensuring that you attain success with regards to your goals. When you have reached those goals, you do not shy away from taking pride in your accomplishments. You are also guided by logic, facts and objectivity when it comes to decision making. In dealing with others, you naturally speak your mind, sharing your thoughts and opinions openly.","descriptionID":"Anda adalah orang yang mengutamakan target dan hasil. Ketika melakukan pendekatan terhadap banyak hal, Anda biasanya mengambil pendekatan yang berorientasi pada tujuan sambil mencari cara yang berbeda untuk terus-menerus menjadi yang terbaik dalam apa yang Anda lakukan dan memastikan bahwa Anda mencapai kesuksesan yang sesuai dengan tujuan Anda. Ketika Anda telah mencapai tujuan tersebut, Anda merasa bangga atas pencapaian yang telah didapatkan. Anda berpegang teguh pada logika, fakta, dan objektivitas dalam hal pengambilan keputusan. Dalam berurusan dengan orang lain, Anda secara alami mengungkapkan pikiran Anda, membagikan pemikiran, dan pendapat Anda secara terbuka."},{"trait":"Motivated by Order","iconKey":"icon_thalanil","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"conformity","score":0},{"traitId":"timely","score":0},{"traitId":"organized","score":0},{"traitId":"temperance","score":25}],"descriptionEN":"You see the importance of structure and process in relation to your environment. When approaching tasks, you plan and organize your actions well, and you also want things to be done in a diligent fashion. It is also natural for you to follow rules and regulations because you see them as things that can effectively maintain order. You are also able to control yourself well, making sure that you do not fall easily to your desires and temptations.","descriptionID":"Anda menganggap bahwa struktur dan proses merupakan hal yang penting di lingkungan Anda. Saat menjalankan tugas, Anda selalu membuat rencana dan mengatur setiap aktivitas dengan baik. Anda juga ingin hal-hal diselesaikan tepat waktu. Wajar bagi Anda untuk mengikuti aturan dan peraturan karena Anda melihatnya sebagai hal yang dapat menjaga ketertiban secara umum. Anda juga mampu mengendalikan diri dengan baik dan mampu memastikan bahwa Anda tidak mudah jatuh terhadap godaan."},{"trait":"Motivated by Ambiguity","iconKey":"icon_blossom","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"versatile","score":0},{"traitId":"instinctive","score":0},{"traitId":"opportunistic","score":0},{"traitId":"unorthodox","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You are someone who values flexibility and lateral solutions in relation to your environment. When faced with ambiguous situations, you are able to improvise and even shift your plans to adapt to changing circumstances. If you are unsure on what to do, you allow your gut feeling to help guide your action. You also have the ability to spot and seize opportunities that people may miss. Furthermore, you also feel comfortable with stepping outside the box, which enables you to become “liberal” in how you approach different processes and situations.","descriptionID":"Anda adalah seseorang yang menghargai fleksibilitas dan solusi yang kreatif dalam lingkungan Anda. Ketika dihadapkan dengan situasi yang ambigu, Anda dapat berimprovisasi dan bahkan mengubah rencana Anda untuk beradaptasi dengan keadaan yang tidak menentu. Jika Anda tidak yakin tentang apa yang harus dilakukan, Anda membiarkan firasat Anda untuk memandu tindakan Anda. Selain itu, Anda juga memiliki kemampuan untuk melihat dan menangkap peluang yang mungkin dilewatkan orang. Anda juga merasa nyaman untuk melangkah di luar zona kenyamanan yang memungkinkan Anda menjadi \"bebas\" dalam cara Anda mendekati proses dan situasi yang berbeda."},{"trait":"Outgoing","iconKey":"icon_brutus","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"adventurous","score":0},{"traitId":"assertive","score":0},{"traitId":"optimistic","score":0},{"traitId":"gregarious","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You are someone who is extraverted and energetic around others. You have a strong desire to be around many people, as social interactions provide you with energy. When you are with a group of people, you enjoy taking charge and seizing initiative, and others would say that you are a natural initiator. Furthermore, you possess a disposition and a zest for life, having a tendency to look on the bright side of things. It also is natural for you to be on-the-go, having the desire to seek new and exciting experiences. ","descriptionID":"Anda adalah seseorang yang ekstrovert dan energik di sekitar orang lain. Anda memiliki keinginan yang kuat untuk berada di sekitar banyak orang karena interaksi sosial memberi Anda energi. Ketika Anda bersama sekelompok orang, Anda senang untuk mengambil alih dan mengambil inisiatif. Orang lain akan mengatakan bahwa Anda adalah seorang inisiator. Selain itu, Anda memiliki watak dan semangat hidup yang memiliki kecenderungan untuk melihat sisi baik dari berbagai situasi. Wajar bagi Anda untuk memiliki keinginan mencari pengalaman baru dan menarik."},{"trait":"Reserved","iconKey":"icon_callythia","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"independent","score":0},{"traitId":"intimate","score":75},{"traitId":"introspective","score":0},{"traitId":"restrained","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You are someone who is introverted and composed. You understand the importance of getting to know yourself better. Hence, you dedicate time for self-reflection, and you feel comfortable with and prefer to be by yourself. It is also natural for you to have a more restrained demeanor and to prefer staying away from the spotlight. In relation to others, you thrive best in an intimate setting or with a small group of friends.","descriptionID":"Anda adalah seseorang yang introvert dan tenang. Anda memahami pentingnya mengenal diri sendiri lebih baik. Karena itu, Anda mendedikasikan waktu untuk refleksi diri dan lebih cenderung untuk menyendiri. Wajar juga jika Anda memiliki sikap yang lebih terkendali dan lebih suka menjauh dari sorotan. Dalam hubungan dengan orang lain, Anda berkembang paling baik apabila bersama teman-teman yang memang sudah akrab atau dengan kelompok kecil."},{"trait":"Innovative","iconKey":"icon_hector","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"ingenuity","score":0},{"traitId":"inquisitive","score":50},{"traitId":"intricate","score":0},{"traitId":"strategically-minded","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You understand the importance of creativity without constraints. It is natural for you to think outside the box and come up with new and innovative ideas. Because you value the “new”, you also prefer variety over routine and have an eagerness to explore different things. Regarding your thought processes, you are comfortable with complexity and like to think deeply and intricately about things. Furthermore, when there are specific occurrences, you do not just think about the event in itself, but also about the bigger picture, seeing its wider implications.","descriptionID":"Anda memahami pentingnya kreativitas tanpa batas. Wajar bagi Anda untuk berpikir di luar kebiasaan dan menghasilkan ide-ide baru yang inovatif. Karena Anda menghargai hal-hal yang baru, Anda juga lebih suka variasi daripada melakukan rutinitas dan memiliki keinginan untuk mengeksplorasi hal-hal yang berbeda. Mengenai proses berpikir Anda, Anda merasa nyaman dengan kerumitan dan suka berpikir secara mendalam tentang berbagai hal. Ketika ada kejadian tertentu, Anda tidak hanya memikirkan peristiwa itu sendiri tetapi juga Anda memiliki kemampuan untuk melihat implikasi yang lebih luas terhadap situasi tersebut."},{"trait":"Pragmatic","iconKey":"icon_zierick","score":0,"subtrait":[{"traitId":"conventional","score":0},{"traitId":"methodical","score":0},{"traitId":"present-minded","score":0},{"traitId":"utilitarian","score":0}],"descriptionEN":"You are someone who is realistic and driven by practical considerations. When approaching your tasks, you have a tendency to follow a step-by-step approach, and you focus more on the here and now more than things that are yet to come. You also feel comfortable with methods that have been tried-and-tested. Furthermore, in making value judgments, you are concerned mainly with the usage and utility of different objects and ideas.","descriptionID":"Anda adalah seseorang yang realistis dan didorong oleh pertimbangan praktis. Ketika menjalankan tugas, Anda memiliki kecenderungan untuk mengikuti pendekatan langkah-demi-langkah dan lebih fokus kepada hal yang terjadi sekarang daripada hal-hal yang akan datang. Anda juga merasa nyaman dengan metode yang telah dicoba dan diuji. Dalam membuat penilaian, Anda memperhatikan kegunaan berbagai objek dan ide."}],"aptitudeMetaData":[{"game":"memory-of-spades","aptitudeId":"Visual Perception","score":0,"accuracy":0,"timeLeft":0,"maxScore":1200},{"game":"puzzle-block","aptitudeId":"Spatial Reasoning","score":0,"accuracy":0,"timeLeft":0,"maxScore":400},{"game":"guess-the-word","aptitudeId":"Verbal Comprehension","score":0,"accuracy":0,"timeLeft":0,"maxScore":500}],"rawData":[{"index":1,"substraits":["competitive","temperance","intimate","inquisitive"],"score":[100,25,75,50]}]}
